Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.style

Style management for ELKI visualizations.

See: Description


  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClassStylingPolicy
    Styling policy that is based on classes, for example clusters or labels.
    SingleObjectsStylingPolicy
    Styling policy based on assigning objects individual colors.
    StyleLibrary
    Style library interface.
    StylingPolicy
    Styling policy.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClusterStylingPolicy
    Styling policy based on cluster membership.
    PropertiesBasedStyleLibrary
    Style library loading the parameters from a properties file.
    StyleResult
    Result to encapsulate active styling rules.

Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.style Description

Style management for ELKI visualizations.
